Tagline: Advancing naval research further than you can imagine.
Overview:
The U.S. Naval Research Laboratory conducts a broad spectrum of cutting-edge scientific research with immediate and long-range applications for the Department of the Navy, the Defense Department and the nation.

Please visit the official NRL website at http://www.nrl.navy.mil/. If you have a media query, please contact the NRL public affairs at 202-480-3746 or nrlpao@nrl.navy.mil.
